ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: all of whom were tyrants in their lands
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who transgressed in the countries of the world
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who rebelled in the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who did transgress beyond bounds in the lands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who committed inordinacy in the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who all were insolent in the land
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who (all) were rebellious (to Allah) in these lands,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All of them committed excesses in their lands,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who all waxed exorbitant in the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who rebelled [against Allah] in their cities
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (All) these transgressed beyond bounds in the lands,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who did transgress beyond bounds in the lands (in the disobedience of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They were tyrants in the land
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who committed excesses in the lands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:11] those who were rebellious, became tyrannical, in the land,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who (all) were rebellious (to Allah) in these lands) they rebelled and declared their disbelief in the land of Egypt; it is also said that their transgression led them to this,
